profile:
Campbell Tree Experts Inc. – Your Ottawa Tree Specialists

ONLY Gifted and Certified Arborists  employed so that the work is done right the first time. 

Keep your property safe while protecting your investment with the ISA Certified Arborist and ISA Certified Tree Workers at Campbell Tree Experts Inc. Serving the Ottawa area since 1992, we provide a full range of tree services from 24-hour emergency storm recovery to pruning and stump grinding.

  
Ensuring the Healthy Growth of Your Trees

Campbell Tree Experts Inc. cares for nature’s green gifts with highly-trained arborists skilled in pruning, cabling and bracing to ensure the healthy growth of your trees. As educated ISA Certified Arborist and ISA Certified Tree Workers, we can diagnose and manage pest and disease infestations. When necessary, we can remove dangerous trees from your property in a safe and efficient manner. We are a number one source for tree services in the Ottawa region.

Equipment to Handle Jobs of All Sizes

With 86’ crane trucks and 65’ bucket trucks, Campbell Tree Experts Inc. has the equipment and expertise to take on jobs of all sizes. We also feature 24” capacity chippers and stump grinders capable of entering gates as narrow as 31”. Campbell Tree Experts Inc. is Fully Insured and carries WSIB coverage for all employees

  
Local ownership at your service!

Born and raised in the Ottawa area, from 17 years old Owner Glen Campbell (ISA Certified Arborist) has had a passion for the outdoors & nature.

Gaining his experience with local tree company owners, he decided to open his own business in 1992 along with his wife Lynn Arbour-Campbell (ISA Certified Arborist).

   

Hiring an ISA Certified Arborist & ISA Certified Tree Worker

An ISA Certified Arborist and ISA Certified Tree Workers are specialists in the care of individual trees and can determine what type of pruning is necessary to improve the health, appearance, and safety of your trees. ISA Certified Arborist and ISA Certified Tree Workers are knowledgeable about the needs of trees, trained and equipped to provide proper care.

Trained work crews have all the required safety equipment, liability insurance and workers compensation coverage. Pruning and removals can be very dangerous and should be performed by properly certified tree care companies.

If you are looking for fast and efficient tree service in Ottawa, contact us today!
services:
Complete Tree Services in Ottawa & Surrounding Areas
At Campbell Tree Experts Inc., we view trees as an integral part of our environment and a valuable element of your landscape. We offer a wide range of tree care services in Ottawa and surrounding areas designed to promote the healthy growth of your natural resources.



Our ISA Certified Arborist and ISA Certified Tree Workers are skilled in pruning, trimming, cabling and bracing. If you have a pest or disease infestation, we can quickly diagnose and manage the problem.

profile:
Pruning is essential for the health, appearance and structure of your trees.

A common request for pruning, is to thin and deadwood. This type of prune removes up to 25% of the leaf-bearing canopy, allowing light and air through the canopy to improve overall health, remove deadwood and improve the structure of the tree.

The amount of material removed should be limited when pruning. A good objective is to remove any branches that are rubbing, diseased, dead or have a weak attachment. This can help to beautify, make safe and prolong the life of your tree!

profile:
Tree King is a full service tree care company which encourages the preservation of trees. We provide a wide range of solutions proven by experience and on-going staff training to help you achieve your vision for the longevity of your trees.

At Tree King, we are entirely dedicated to our clients and their trees. Our team of arborists have the knowledge, training and experience to fulfill of all your tree care needs in the safest manor possible. Whether you require tree pruning, tree removal, or stump grinding we are able to provide experienced, professional and affordable services to help you around your property. When you contact Tree King, we take the time to thoroughly explain all of your options and provide you with a detailed written quote. Our combined expertise in residential and commercial jobs allows us to tackle jobs of any size, from the single tree in your backyard to a large contract. When completing a tree service, we use professional equipment and approved safety gear to eliminate the risk of personal injury and damage to property.

Our team at Tree King shares a deep passion for trees and have all completed post-secondary education. They have also achieved or are working towards ISA certification. This ensures that the quality of work will always be to the highest of standards. Tree King also carries full liability insurance to provide our clients a stress free experience.
